mapper.select: SELECT standard_id, standard_name, standard_description, prompt_template, weight_percentage, job_group, job_role, created_at, updated_at, evaluation_items, score_range_description FROM portfolio_standard WHERE standard_id = #{standardId}

SELECT standard_id, standard_name, standard_description, prompt_template, weight_percentage, job_group, job_role, created_at, updated_at, evaluation_items, score_range_description FROM portfolio_standard ORDER BY standard_name

SELECT standard_id, standard_name, standard_description, prompt_template, weight_percentage, job_group, job_role, created_at, updated_at, evaluation_items, score_range_description FROM portfolio_standard WHERE (job_group LIKE '%' || #{param1} || '%' OR #{param1} LIKE '%' || job_group || '%') AND (job_role LIKE '%' || #{param2} || '%' OR #{param2} LIKE '%' || job_role || '%' OR job_role IS NULL) ORDER BY CASE WHEN job_role IS NOT NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, weight_percentage DESC, standard_id ASC

SELECT standard_id, standard_name, standard_description, prompt_template, weight_percentage, job_group, job_role, created_at, updated_at, evaluation_items, score_range_description FROM portfolio_standard WHERE job_group = #{jobGroup} ORDER BY weight_percentage DESC, standard_id ASC

SELECT standard_id, standard_name, standard_description, prompt_template, weight_percentage, job_group, job_role, created_at, updated_at, evaluation_items, score_range_description FROM portfolio_standard WHERE standard_name = #{standardName}

SELECT standard_id, standard_name, standard_description, prompt_template, weight_percentage, job_group, job_role, created_at, updated_at, evaluation_items, score_range_description FROM portfolio_standard WHERE weight_percentage >= #{minWeight} ORDER BY weight_percentage DESC
